meanings.definition: A type of ceramic ware that is partially made of porcelain.
meanings.sent1: The store displayed beautiful semiporcelains on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: I bought a set of semiporcelains for my dining table.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter almost dropped the stack of semiporcelains!
meanings.sent4: Her delicate features resembled the smooth texture of semiporcelains.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight gleamed off the semiporcelains, creating a stunning display.

meanings.sent1: The museum showcased ancient semiporcelains from different cultures.
meanings.sent2: She collected unique semiporcelains from her travels.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the fragile semiporcelains.
meanings.sent4: His words were as delicate as the intricate designs on semiporcelains.
meanings.sent5: The artist crafted a masterpiece using semiporcelains as the main material.
